channel.description: Implement effective authentication strategies Click here to give feedback about this page About This Page Page ID: 483 Is this a new page?: Existing doc: changes are needed to update the doc and to fit the new IA Target personas: Internal app builders, Saas Builder Changes to be made: Title change Links to original docs: Authentication factors: https://developer.okta.com/docs/concepts/iam-overview-authentication-factors/ Page type: Concept Content type: Explanation Explanations present a more detailed dive into a single topic compared to Conceptual Overviews.
